STBLKeyStringList.Text: (From Failing to Complete a Paranormal Investigator Gig)
A Specter has started a fire!
You’re feeling somewhat courageous. Any rational mind would be afraid, but hey, you do you.
(From Stepping Foot on a Haunted House)
You’re understandably upset. Some sort of cruel deity has sent you here. If you’re gonna blame anybody, blame THEM.
I think we’re gonna get along great!
Don't mention it! Plus now we can be TWINSIES!
Ah, it's all in the past. Enjoy the coat!
{0.SimFirstName} received a Paranormal Investigator License and is ready to take on Paranormal Investigator gigs!
Bye for now, I'll be back again soon!
(From Being an Adrenaline Seeker in a Haunted Lot)
Nope! Nope! Nope! I did not sign up for this. You'll never take me alive!
{0.SimFirstName} is now eligible to receive a Paranormal Investigator License! Ask Guidry for more details! Congratulations!
Wow... uh... thanks. I will treasure it until the day I die I guess.
Maybe this will help me forget my troubles.
Are we like... dating now? Do you want to make out or something?
Um... okay. I'm gonna go... float over here I guess.
Are you asking me out? I'm single in case you're wondering and I'm willing to get weird.
Hi. How are you? Oh I'm just here, hovering and stuff.
I never knew I wanted this but I love it.
Does that mean we're soul mates now? Should I move in or do you move in with me?
Am I supposed to eat this. Because I will. Maybe even right now.
What? Who are you? What is this? Hello? Is this some kind of unsolicited call? What if I came to your house and started banging on your door? Go Welcome Wagon some other ghost, I'm not interested.
Get a life! Oh right... you have one and you're wasting it. Must be nice.
I've been watching over you for quite some time, and I gotta say, I'm NOT impressed. Could you at least work on trying next time?
You hear the faint sound of a modem connecting to the internet, but it sounds almost if a ghost is trying to imitate the sounds with its mouth. You only have questions.
You overhear the sound of chewing on the other end, they might not realize their mic is on.
Eeny meeny miney moe… one potato, two potato, three potato, four… bubblegum bubblegum in a dish...
Meow! Meeeeow? Purrr. Purrrr. Mew mew mew.

Wow! The Living! Here! Talking with me! It's been ever so long I've conversed with someone non-departed, I don't even know where to be begin! How about those... sports teams? Is breathing still a thing?
Now that I'm dead I can finally catch up on all those shows I've been meaning to watch! Who am I kidding? Maybe I'll just leave them in queue forever.
Heya! Just wanted to let you know that we're all rooting for you! Keep it up!
Hey there! I'm actually your great, great, great, great-grandfather! Or at least I think I am? It all gets a little muddled, and my eyes aren't what they used to be, but I'm rootin' for ya champ!
Eh, being dead ain't so bad. Waaaaay less responsibility, and much more my style.
Don't let your dreams be memes. I think I read that somewhere.
Make the most of your life! Don't stay indoors playing some life simulator all day and night like me!
No matter how bad things may seem, at least you're not dead like me! Chin up!
Hey! Before you go, can you describe what ice cream tastes like? It's been so long...
It's always just "OK" with you people, not "Are you OK?"...
I wish I lived in the time of smart phones... they look pretty cool. I used to have a barrel I would play in.
The other side is okay, but I wish I'd brought a book. Having an eternity with just your thoughts isn't as peaceful as it seems.
I know what you did last summer...
They're coming soon. Better think twice about opening the door.
The flashing light was just a test. You'll have plenty of warning next time.
Wouldn't it be fun if something terrible happened tonight?
(From being Near a Very Special Specter)

Uh-oh, {0.SimFirstName} ran home terrified! The Paranormal Investigation was cancelled! Sometimes you might need to accompany Sims on their Paranormal Investigations to help ensure success, especially for harder Gigs!
{0.SimFirstName} thinks this is quite spooky... and {M0.HE}{F0.SHE} LOVES IT!
You feel an immense uncomfortable presence emanating nearby.
That didn't quite go as planned, but hey this works too!
{0.SimFirstName} failed the one job as a Paranormal Investigator. They will carry this guilt with them for the rest of their life, or maybe for the next 90 minutes or so.
{0.SimFirstName} cant help but notice this place is a little... Haunted.

{0.SimFirstName} is having a bad time. Sims who are this scared need to occasionally scream it out for a bit. Try to get their fear in check by staying near a Sacred Candle, or hiding under the covers for awhile.
Energy courses through your veins! The warnings of taking strange candy is greatly exaggerated.
Okay, there are definitely limits to how many you should eat.
{0.SimFirstName} spirit has coalesced with the afterlife!
Temperance has invaded! Maybe Guidry knows what to do?
Losing a piece of your soul isn't the most pleasant feeling. At least that Specter made good use of it, right?
{0.SimFirstName} wants to be a Paranormal Investigator when {M0.he}{F0.she} grows up!
{0.SimFirstName} is very optimistic about their Haunted House adventure!
Sims near Sacred Candles are protected from the harmful affects of a Haunted House, and are their fear levels will decrease gradually too!
Is it too late to turn back?
{0.SimFirstName} feels the presence of a foreboding aura.
Whatever was in that thing, it sure hit the spot! Probably wont have to worry about eating for awhile!
You feel strangely more experienced, as if the memories from another life poured into you. What a rush!
Whatever that Specter did, it sure feels good! Maybe Specters aren't so bad after all...
{0.SimFirstName} knew this place was haunted, but some things are creepy no matter how you slice it.
{0.SimFirstName} has successfully performed a ceremony! While it was a little taxing on the soul, it feels like it was all worth it!
I Ain't Afraid of No Ghosts
There is something mildly disturbing about this whole situation...
Uh-oh, {0.SimFirstName}'s ceremony didn't go so smoothly. Ceremonies can be very taxing, make sure {M0.his}{F0.her} Needs are high before attempting one!
One moment you're alive, the next you're like THIS?!
{0.SimFirstName} received a warning from the beyond.
{0.SimFirstName} just wanted to talk to the dead, but all they got were feels.
Someone who's lived their entire life probably has good perspective on things!
You know, just a casual conversation with some dead people, how bout you?
{0.SimFirstName} has a knack for this, and will gain Medium Skill faster!
The dearly departed certainly have some... uhh... unique perspectives?
{0.SimFirstName}'s Paranormal Investigation starts in one hour! Get ready!
It's time for {0.SimFirstName}'s investigation! Would you like to follow {0.SimFirstName}?
{0.SimFirstName}'s investigation will end in one hour.
This Agency requires a Paranormal Investigator License to join. Talk to Guidry on a Haunted House Residential lot to learn more. Additionally you can also purchase the License from the Reward Store.
Go to the haunted location and get rid of anything spooky, by any means necessary!
You also earned a reward object!
{0.SimFirstName} failed to complete the Gig on time.
Nice work Investigator!\nPeace has been restored!... for now.
{0.SimFirstName} has been recognized for great performance and client satisfaction. In addition to raising {F0.her}{M0.his} rate, {0.SimFirstName} also received rewards!\n\n{7.String}

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> §750</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Starts at:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> §3000</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Starts at:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> §1500</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Starts at:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}
The reviews for this company are... really quite bizarre. For some reason users seem to flood it with the message, "Justice For Bonehilda".

Paranormal Investigators are the ones who are called when things go bump in the night. While the job requires you to work through the night, there is a lot of freedom in the type of work to do. Harder gigs mean better rewards, but who knows... it might get pretty spooky there.
The reviews for this company are quite bizarre, users seem to flood it with the message, "Justice For Bonehilda".

Paranormal Investigators are the ones who are called when things go bump in the night. While the job requires you to work through the night, there is a lot of freedom in the type of work to do. Harder gigs mean better rewards, but who knows... it might get pretty spooky there.
<font color='#EC262E'>Survive 7 nights in a Haunted House to unlock</font>

Is this really THE veil we've all heard so much about? Okay, so it's not the veil that separates the living and the dead, but this curtain still got lots of fantastic uses, most of which are interior decoration related, but if you put a lot of thought into it, you could probably come up with a list of occult reasons too. Shiny!

Is this really THE veil we've all heard so much about? Okay, so it's not the veil that separates the living and the dead, but it's still got lots of fantastic uses, most of which are interior decoration related, but if you put a lot of thought into it, you could probably come up with a list of occult reasons too. Shiny!

This antique beauty once belonged to Great Aunt Blanche, but it's unclear on whose Great Aunt she actually was. Was she your Great Aunt, my Great Aunt, a distant friend of the family? One thing is certain though: Great Aunt Blanche was a cheek-pincher. At any family gathering, she would be there, pinching cheeks of anyone under her age. "Look at that face!" Pinch, pinch, pinch! Great Aunt Blanche is no longer with us, but previous owners of this desk have felt a strange tingling sensation in their cheeks whenever they take a seat. Pinch, pinch, pinch!

Take a sip of the most cool, refreshing drink there is: Specter Sip! Aaah! Soulful and fizzy! If you've ever drunk a part of somebody's soul, you'll know that their memories and general essence come with it, so get ready to sponge it all up and revel in the strangeness.

This fireplace was constructed using stones from an old morgue. Why anyone thought that was ever a good idea is unclear, but worse decisions have been made. For example, peanut butter and pickle sandwiches are a thing. Further musings on both topics, however, does yield the thought that perhaps there are people who want a fireplace made of morgue bricks, and people who are wondering when this sentence will be over so they can take a nice juicy bite out of their peanut butter and pickle sandwich.

Nowadays, creating recipes with what is at hand is the norm, so why not use Ectoplasm for baking? We can't validate the nutritional value of Ectoplasm but it does make for a great ingredient for a cake that is fluffy and levitating with flavor.

The floor creaked beneath her feet as she followed the apparition down the old hallway. The ghostly figure was clearly trying to tell her something... but what? Suddenly, she realized a trap door lay at her feet. Maybe this secret cavern held the key to discovering the old manor's most hidden mystery. She decided she would pull it open on the count of three. One... two - all of the sudden she noticed three lovely lights swinging above her and wondered where the manor's decorator got them. Those lights were just what she was looking for to complete her dining room! The antique metal finish... the vintage glass. Perfection! She let go of the trap door and pulled out her phone to take reference shots for later... and maybe one for Simstagram. She couldn't believe her luck. The lighting fixtures of her dreams in the most unexpected of places!

Did that light just move? This table light is a tad wicked in the sense that it looks like it could jump up and run off any second. Rest assured that it hasn't yet, but we can't really guarantee anything. Nothing is certain in life... or in lights. What we can guarantee is a cute little light which may or may not be plotting to run off with your candelabra. Cheeky...

Spirits begone! Place sacred candles to protect Sims and lower fear. But beware, some entities will try to blow them out! Keep them lit and help your Sims get a good night's sleep! Made from only the finest Wraith Wax.

If your life has experienced an upheaval recently, or you have a sense things might go topsy-turvy any day now, prepare yourself with this calming tea tray. A peaceful treat in any circumstance, whether you're dealing with monumental stress, scary times, or minor every day annoyances. Remember: take a moment for yourself!
Moment of Peace Tea Set Tray

Reveling in the night is fun, until you trip over your own feet. This playful petal shaped wall sconce lets you enjoy the evening all you want without risk of careening head first into a punch bowl or smashing into a grand piano. All fun ways to expire, but really spoils the party for everyone else.

As the story goes, Darius Taupe, the last owner of this eclectic collection of art was quite surprised to see his portrait appear on the wall. Thinking it was some sort of prank, he confronted a friend who then denied any involvement. The strange incident was reported to the local police who weren't quite sure what to do. After all, the property had been added, not stolen. A week later, Taupe's friend reported him missing... but his portrait still remained until it was collected as evidence. A mystery that doubles as a great gallery wall!
Claude René Duplantier Guidry, Present Day. Paranormal Investigator, beloved flirt, and paranormal entity. Perished in an untimely Murphy Bed accident.
Portrait of Claude René Duplantier Guidry Post Mortem
Claude René Duplantier Guidry, 1883-1920: Paranormal Investigator and beloved flirt.
Portrait of Claude René Duplantier Guidry
A painting of the last known residence of Temperance: malicious spirit, avid poltergeist, and former love interest of Claude René Duplantier Guidry. Rumor has it, she's recently moved...
Let this sprawling ivy creep into your heart and choke you up with its beauty. It's just looking for a little TLC: Tendril loving care.

What happened to the first 107 botanical arrangements? Oh, never you mind that. Moving swiftly on, this lovely arrangement features preserved alstroemeria flowers. These flowers help draw wealth and good fortune into your space, but also symbolize friendship... even on the otherworldly plane. Place in an area you'd like to create positivity and friendly vibes.

In the house of Goth, many things have been around for generations but the most surprising one is this palm tree which dates back generations. It's technically a houseplant, so shouldn't it be dead by now?! According to Goth family lore, this tree used to grace the parlor of a palm reader. One day, the tree bore a single coconut which dropped onto the noggin of the palm reader during a reading. Irritated that she didn't predict the unpleasant bop on the head, the palm reader gave the palm to her old friend: Lady Ravendancer Goth. The tree never produced any more coconuts, but still...watch out.

Often the best way to dissipate negative energy fields is stabilize them first. This botanical arrangement uses preserved fig leaf, maple, and royal purple branches gathered in a rope wrapped vase. Promotes feelings of calm, safety, and stability. We can't guarantee placing this lovely arrangement will yield fewer ghosties and ghoulies, but they'll definitely admire your décor choices.

A lovely yet ordinary coffee table. It doesn't fly. It doesn't talk. It doesn't recite creepy poems. It doesn't contain trapped spirits and it can't dance. It just sits there. It does have a small scratch on the underside of it though, which is why we can't advertise it as completely normal.
A puddle of something... is that a face?

What are these encrypted symbols and what do they mean? Where did they come from? Are they an ancient prophecy? Either way, they look cool. Like one of those foreign language tattoos that you eventually find out is a grocery list or a naughty word.
It's a séance on the go! If you don't have a full séance table setup, this chalk circle can help perform many of the same functions.

After the old library was demolished, the foreman discovered a long forgotten rug amongst the debris. Miraculously, it sustained little damage. It is rumored that the rug used to adorn the floor of the occult section and inadvertently been exposed to mumbled protective spells over the years. Or maybe it was just lucky. It's also possible that it's just a plain, ordinary rug that's rugly duties have not been fulfilled yet, and so it gets to stay in this mortal plane at least a little longer...
A weed-like tendril that appears on Haunted lots.
Unlike the Twisted Tendril, this Strange Overgrowth is actually friendly! It seems to be quite resilient too, what on earth is this thing feeding on anyway?

This is a jar full of grumpy specters who have a bit of an attitude problem! They're kind of irritable, but they're dead and live in a jar so their outlook on life or lack thereof is pretty understandable.
Oozy clay hands that appear from the ground.

Housed in a petite terrarium, this compact cowplant can be your new best friend, provided you keep it well-fed. Normal varieties of Cowplants AKA Laganaphyllis Simnovorii are large enough to swallow a sim whole, but this mini variety thankfully does not have that big of an appetite. Still, it's best not to tempt fate. Avoid tapping on glass. A miniature stature does not equal a miniature attitude.
Need therapy? You can tell Dahlia anything! Talking to Dahlia will soothe and decrease fear, so let it all out. She's here for you!

A gentleman named Claude René Duplantier Guidry acquired this falcon statue during his world adventures years ago. It is said to be a symbol of power and healing, with eyes that represent the sun and moon. Those closest to Guidry say he kept the statue close to him, even during his final days.

Specters will sometimes leave soul scraps behind. Soul scraps are pieces of... you guessed it... souls! The soul of a Sim which is contained inside an orb by the mystical power of runes. Souls are a delicious delicacy! Snack on a soul scrap if you're wanting to feel rejuvenated, or if you just want a weird story to tell your friends sometime.

A less accursed version of the clay hands that might appear while living on a haunted lot. These ones are only for decoration, although you must be going for some pretty creepy decor to want these in you house.
This jar contains friendly specters. Specter buddies are benevolent spirits who want to help you out! Now that's a good specter!
This jar contains mopey specters who are pretty bummed out that they don't get to eat ice cream or go to the beach anymore. Womp womp. Poor little Specters! At least they can hang out with you!

Paranormal investigator Claude René Duplantier Guidry picked up one of these bizarre idols while investigating a haunted museum in the early 1900s. He found out the hard way that it wards off any particularly nasty supernatural entities, including Temperance. If you don't know who Temperance is, you'll find out soon enough... and you might want some of these idols around for when that time comes. She doesn't like them, and they sure don't like her. How bizarre!
It's a crystal. Nothing more. But it is highly sensitive to spirit activity, which is a fancy way of saying if you have it on the table during a séance, it lights up!

This statue has the ability to alter the rules of a Haunted House slightly. Capable of making things more challenging, or ensuring a certain ghost doesn't appear at night. These rules are entirely optional, and can be disabled if you change your mind.

Silhouettes were all the rage in the Victorian era, and with your help they can make a comeback. If you're fed up with Simstagram filters and photo manipulation, let's take it back to basics: shadowy solid profiles! Never worry about your makeup, hair or complexion in a photo again.

Specters will sometimes leave jars of candy behind. These sweet treats are basically the fruit cake of the spirit world, a welcoming gesture meant with the best of intentions. Go on, have one! But maybe not too many. Taking candy from strangers is an even better idea when the stranger is on another plane of existence.

Wraith Wax is used to create sacred candles - a great way to keep calm and carry on during hauntings! Thanks to the otherworldly properties of Wraith Wax, you don't need any candlemaking skills. Whew!
Found at an eclectic flea market, this macramé wall hanging has a fine sense of style and an overall aura of good vibes. Why anyone would give it up is a mystery!

This snazzy sideboard hails from the old headquarters of one of the oldest paranormal investigation groups in the world, and still comes with a few old case journals intact! Recommended reading: The Case of the Jilted Boo, Inspector Specter, and Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's an Animated Skeleton Wearing a Maid Outfit.

Discovering your home may be severely haunted might come as a surprise to many, but eventually, you'll have to move on and start thinking about adding some personality to your space... aside from the phantom personalities that are already there. After all, dwelling on the past is what caused all these spirits to stick around in the first place. We suggest this boho inspired shelf, which adds a striking design element to any room. Pothos plant included!

You've heard of a séance table... but the séance chair plays an important role as well in summoning otherworldly spirits. Have you tried conducting a séance while standing? It just won't work. Unaligned chakras... etc. The first thing they teach in séance school is that in order to talk to properly address the spirit world your rear end must be fully supported at all times. It's just science.

A stylish chair which once adorned the parlor of the eccentric Mrs. Speck. According to historical diary entries written by her family, Mrs. Speck was very wealthy and obsessed with vanity. This particular chair is said to have been where she would sit and comb her tall bouffant hair every morning before she swam in the lily pond behind her mansion. Her housekeeper joked with her that her hair was getting so tall, the weight of it would give her neck pain.\n\nSadly, one day she went for her morning swim and never returned. No one knows exactly what happened to her, but many have speculated. Rumors swirled around her social circles for a while, and then she was forgotten in time. On the upside, this chair is in excellent condition!

Claude René Duplantier Guidry was above all else, a serial romantic -- but on nights when he wasn't out on the town with the ladies and gents, he could be found in his favorite chair. A lover of love, Guidry spent many evenings by the fire entertaining his romantic conquests...though eventually he would move onto the loveseat. Wink!

This plush loveseat once belonged to the eligible bachelor and socialite, Claude René Duplantier Guidry. Guidry has always had somewhat of a "reputation", but boy did he earn it! The only thing Guidry loves more than life is love, and he carried out many of his flirtatious encounters on this very loveseat. We don't blame anyone who falls head over heels for this piece of furniture... or its former owner.

This decadent velveteen sofa bounced around several thrift shops before finding its way into the break room of a local cemetery. Recognizing it had the potential for greatness, the gravedigger had it appraised only to find out it once belonged to Violetta Von Victoria... someone he had recently interred. This sofa clearly was trying to make its way back to its beloved owner. So close, sofa. Now that's true love.

Sure, this may look like a twee little table, but in it resides PURE RAGE! Crafted hundreds of years ago by the famous woodworker Huffy McLivid, this table has auras of grumpy anger. Do not be fooled by its sweet exterior. This table listens to Death Metal and will never conform to societal expectations.
Spirits who lurk in the shadows at rest Bring us good fortune upon our request Wishes for happiness, luck if you're able And our heart's true desire: a brand new end table

This gold plated end table is crafted from an old scrying glass. Used in divination, a scrying glass can potentially give messages and visions from the beyond... if the seeker knows how to look. This particular glass obviously never yielded anything significant, otherwise, it wouldn't be repurposed into furniture. Or perhaps, it delivered a portent so terrifying that the previous owner had to hide it in plain sight. Either way, now it's a suitable surface that's been fancied up and ready for whatever you choose to plop on top of it. Here's to upcycling!
There once was a Sim in distress. Her hallway was awfully posessed. Bad decor was the cause but now spirits applaud Since this table's a stunning success.
Perform rituals to lessen any hauntings your home might be experiencing. With this séance table you can summon spirits, commune with the dead, and more! The ultimate conversation starter.
(From Being Terrified in a Haunted House)
This is some kind of nightmare!
I swear I saw a creepy doll, but where did it come from?! Why is it here?!
Were those hands coming out of the ground?! Like... from the literal ground?
Get these things out of here!
Is this place going to stay haunted forever?
Is this standard practice for a Paranormal Investigator?
I think I saw something weird in the other room...
Go get 'em! Show those Specters who's boss!
I don't know but I think those Specters are kinda cute. Look at their little faces!
I knew there was something not right about this place...
This used to be such a nice neighborhood...
I believe in you! You can do it!
Something seems wrong with the lights...
This place has been getting strange lately, do you know anything about this?
Even though this place is haunted... It is a little exciting!
Did you hear that? I swear something is here. I'm being followed I tell you!
Offer a handmade object from your inventory.
Specters only like objects that were handmade with love.
Increases the Investigation meter by small amount.
{0.SimFirstName} is too scared to get near it!
Get this thing outta here! Also increases the spiritual serenity of the house slightly.
This candle has reached the end of it's brief life.
Establish a good rapport with the Specter, or at least try to.
Maybe if you ask nicely? Awards a small amount of Investigation progress if successful.
Just a tiny bit of your soul, it'll grow back right?
(From Offering a Piece of your Soul)
Your soul needs to recover a bit first...
Give a Specter a peace-offering, in hopes of establishing a better relationship.
Awards a large amount of Investigation progress if successful.
This Specter seems friendly enough! In fact it might even be trying to help you? It's still kind of unclear, but they're certainly cute!
This Specter doesn't seem to want anything to do with you. Maybe offering it something special will change its mind?
You have several questions, but just being around this one makes you feel incredibly uncomfortable. Seems friendly enough at least.
You can see the fury in its eyes, it is probably best to stay FAR away from this one. It seems to be planning something diabolical...
You wouldn't eat candy from a ghost... right?
The fragments of a lost soul. It doesn't look like anyone's using it right now, maybe you could put it to some use?
Unlike her scary sister, this doll only wants you to feel at ease.
Only available on Haunted House lots.
The hand statue seems currently unresponsive.
Heroic Mode offers an extra challenge for daring Sims.\n- Haunted Houses become rapidly worse over time. \n- Double the Reward Store Points earned.

Heroic Mode offers an extra challenge for daring Sims.
- Haunted Houses become rapidly worse overtime. 
- Double the Reward Store Points earned.

You must wait 24 Hours before changing this again.
Enable or Disable Guidry's nightly visits.
Hah! Sorry kid, no open positions right now, but I like your moxie!
Ask to Join the Soul Reaper Society
Standing Séances are bad for your posture, so slot some chairs in first. Stop slouching yourself too!
Create a chalk Séance circle on the ground! Don't worry, it washes out eventually.
(From Running Away From a Paranormal Investigation)
Your job is to make this place less haunted, remember?

Yeah you'll want to stay away from those at all costs, those things are SUPER cursed. Just being near them is like nails on a chalkboard for your soul. \n\nMake sure you keep your eyes peeled and get rid of them the second they show up, because they are NOT friendly.

Honestly, just embrace it! 

Collect Specter loot! Purchase Reward Store items! Stomp some dolls! And if you need to scream your lungs out occasionally, do so! 

Adversity is part of being alive, just savor it all!

Of course! The state of a Haunted House degrades over time, so its up to you keep its spookiness in check. 

Performing Ceremonies on the Séance Table is a great way to satiate the entities of the house, as well as appeasing any wandering Specters you might find. 

If you're ever in doubt what state the Haunted House is in, try using the Sense Spiritual Volatility Séance.
"Can I make this place less... Spooky?"
"I want to become a Paranormal Investigator!"

Seekers of the unknown! Used to be one myself a lifetime ago, I've always been interested in things that bump in the night!

There's even an organization out there that recruits properly certified Paranormal Investigators too!

If you can prove your spiritual Medium skills to me, I might just be able to get you certified...

Being afraid is perfectly natural, it happens to all of us!

But if you're having a hard time managing your fears, I strongly urge you to get some Sacred Candles. Being near them soothes your soul and wards off all sorts of nasty feelings. Place them throughout the house if you need to, you can never have too many in my opinion! 

You can make them from Wraith Wax gifted by Specters, or purchase Sacred Candles directly from the Reward Store!

Who knows! Maybe they’re the manifestation of the lost dreams and ambitions of mankind? Or maybe I’m reading into things too much. \n\nOne thing I do know is that they love presents! If you manage to make them happy they'll cough over something useful, and put in a good word with the rest of the entities of the house!

Claude René Duplantier Guidry, but you can call me Guidry! I'm a bit of an expert in the paranormal, and I'll never turn down a chance to help someone in need! I've been chasing after the unknown all my life, and afterlife. \n\nLet me know if you need any help!

Well in case it wasn't immediately apparent, I'm a ghost! And ghosts need to haunt somewhere! If I can crash here for time being, I'll help you out with all the other haunted happenings going around. Little scratch my back, I'll scratch yours. Sound like a deal? But if you're sick of ol' Guidry, you can prevent me from appearing with that weird Hand statue you might have seen. I wont fuss, no questions asked. I'm one of the good guys remember, I'll understand if you need some space!

To be honest everything has been pretty tasteless since my unfortunate demise, but here, try some of this!\n\nIts called Specter Sip! It seems to be made from... actually don't think about that too much. Just try it!
You must be Flirty to say this.

I don't have anymore Idols on me right now, those things are hard to come by!

You might be able to snag one from a Specter if you're lucky though! 

Remember if all else fails, use your Medium skills to give Bonehilda a call on the Séance Table!

Yeah she and I go way back, things are... complicated. But she's definitely bad news. Here, try placing one of these Idols on ground. She hates these things, and conveniently enough they hate her too! If that doesn't work, use your Medium skills to summon Bonehilda! She's actually a master in spirit-based mixed martial arts, and will gladly lend a hand.
I'd offer an Ectocake if I had one, but you can try collecting them from Specters too!\n\nAh, what I wouldn't give to feel hunger again...

No worry! Here, eat this Ectocake! I'm told they taste pretty good!

Managing your mortal needs can sometimes be difficult in a Haunted House. Thankfully eating one of these will keep you satiated for quite awhile!

Also do you see that cute little face on it? It's adorable!
You must be hungrier to ask this.
"I can't get a chance to eat!"

Sorry, I might need a second before I can give away my energy again. 

But if you're having trouble sleeping, keep a Sacred Candle lit next to your bed!

If all else fails, I hear Specters have some kind of special candy stashed somewhere. Just try not to eat too many if possible...

Okay HOLD STILL-

There! Do you feel more... ENERGIZED? Hah! Of course you do! 

Just a little ghost razzle-dazzle, perfectly harmless. Maybe take a shower later though.
You must be tired to say this.
"I can't get a good night's sleep!"

YOU DID IT AGAIN? Of all the...

Alright I don't have a solution this time, you might just need to wait this one out. 

Now I'm definitely a "Try anything once." kinda guy, but please be more considerate of your soul next time? Maybe find another way to appease Specters?

You did WHAT? First of all, how? Second, why? Actually I don't need to know all the details, lets just leave it at that. Thankfully I may have just the solution. Try uhh, absorbing one of these. This should replace whatever you stripped out, and maybe numb that stinging feeling of regret. Just maybe be more conscious of what you do with your soul next time?
You must have sold your soul to a Specter.

Sadly I'm out of Wraith Wax, but you can always find them by appeasing Specters too. 

If you're out of Sacred Candles you might just need to hide under the covers for awhile until you calm down.

And if you're really desperate for Sacred Candles, you can always find them in the Reward Store too.

Whoa! I can see that! You should make sure you're near a Sacred Candle to calm down!

Here, take this Wraith Wax. You can mold this stuff into Sacred Candles!

And no you don't need to be one of those Evergreen Harbor hipsters to make these either. Just give it a try!
You must be terrified to say this.
Ah, you remind me of myself when I was your age. Sorry kid, no openings for the foreseeable future.
Remind {1.SimFirstName} that you're a certified paranormal expert
While {0.SimFirstName} may not be old enough to accept the job yet, {M0.he}{F0.she} can still show off their nifty badge!
The Séance Table is already in use!
Speak with the dearly departed! Maybe they'll offer some wisdom?
Leave your corporeal body behind! Totally safe.
{0.SimFirstName} has already participated in a Ghastly Ritual!
Ghosts don't have much use for this ritual, honestly.
Perform a ceremony to make the house a little less haunted! Be warned, this ceremony drains Sims of their energy! Successful ceremonies also make Sims a little less scared!
Awards a decent amount of Investigation progress if successful.
Ceremony successful! The spiritual serenity of the house has increased!
That was intense! {0.SimFirstName} must wait a little while before performing another Ceremony!
The ceremony was interrupted! The spiritual serenity has lowered!
Sense how haunted the current lot is.

{0.SimFirstName} detects an angry presence lurking nearby. Sims on the lot need to be extra cautious!

- Specters are angry and will scare nearby Sims!
- Paranormal Activity is frequent!

{0.SimFirstName} detects a strong positive presence!

- Specters are friendly!
- Paranormal Activity is reduced!

{0.SimFirstName} detects an uneasy presence lurking. Be on your toes for anything unusual.

- Specters might scare nearby Sims.
- Paranormal Activity is common.

{0.SimFirstName} detects some very happy haunts! The living and the dead are co-existing in harmony! Well done!

- Specters will be friendly!
- Paranormal Activity is reduced!
In case there was any doubt, this place is absolutely still haunted.

{0.SimFirstName} detects an incredibly angry presence nearby! If this were a horror movie, this would be the part where the main characters try to flee for their lives.

- Specters are angry and will scare nearby Sims!
- Specters will occasionally start fires!
- Paranormal Activity is frequent!
{0.SimFirstName} doesn't detect anything out of the ordinary, aside from that ghost nearby. We're all aware of the ghost, right? Right?
{0.SimFirstName} doesn't detect anything out of the ordinary.
Summon the dead onto the lot. Results may vary.
Summon Guidry to hangout for a little bit!
Everything you need to complete a séance in one easy package! Includes séance table, chairs, and crystal ball. Séance-ing has never been so simple!
Sacred Candles that help calm nearby Sims and ward off evil spirits.
Become a certified Paranormal Investigator, unlocking the Paranormal Investigator Freelance Career and the Summon Guidry Séance.
Appease Specters, remove Accursed Objects, and Perform Ceremonies on the Séance Table to finish the Investigation.
Either appease Specters, remove Accursed Objects, or Perform Ceremonies on the Séance Table to make this place less spooky.

In a cruel twist of fate you've ended up in a Haunted House, possibly by the hands of some malevolent mastermind controlling your every action. Maybe make the most of it, surely there's a good reason to be here. \n\n

Hello there, the name's Guidry! It looks like you could use some help with this whole "haunted house" predicament, and thankfully I happen to be an expert on the matter! Also don't you worry, I'm a good spirit! \n\n

You suddenly feel the an immense evil presence. Many spirits dwell here, but this one feels different than the rest. 

If there was ever a time to panic, this might be it.
Wait-what happened in this jacket again?

Wow! You've been living here for quite some time now! You know most people would have turned tail and ran by now! But that's what I like about you, you never compromise! Never give in! 

I may not have much, material possessions are kinda moot for a ghost. But I'd like to offer you something for your perseverance!

Here, take my favorite jacket! Now don't worry, I've got plenty of em', but this is the one I died i- I mean, this one is very special to me.

Now keep it up! Plant your feet firmly in the ground! Haunted or not, this is your home. Life is what you make of it, and I know you'll make something good!

Put your bravery to the test! In this mode the spiritual serenity of the Haunted House will diminish faster at night, increasing paranormal activity and waking up angry Specters.

Thankfully you'll be rewarded with more Reward Store points after each successful night.

But be warned, you won't be able to change out of Heroic Mode until after some time has passed. What is your decision?
Once activated, Guidry will no longer show up at the Haunted House. He won't take it personally, and you can always undo the decision later.\n\nWhat do you say?
Actually, let me think about this...

Now look at you! You're practically brimming with spiritual energy! I knew there was something special about you!

That's why I've got this here Paranormal Investigator's License with your name on it! 

So what do you say, are you ready to take the next step?

Now look at you! You're practically brimming with spiritual energy! I knew there was something special about you! That's why I've got this here Paranormal Investigator's License with your name on it!\n\nUnfortunately I think Child Labor Laws may have changed a bit since I was last alive, so you won't be able to get hired until you're older. But until then, enjoy this spiffy badge!
{0.SimFirstName} can now call upon the dead with the new Invoke the Dead and Summon Bonehilda Séances!
{0.SimFirstName} can now host Séances with other Sims! Group Séance provide increased benefits! Teamwork makes the dream work!
{0.SimFirstName} has started {M0.his}{F0.her} paranormal journey! Continue performing Séances to level up!
{0.SimFirstName} can now perform the Ghastly Ritual on Séance Tables! Let's get weird!

{0.SimFirstName} is now a top notch Medium! {0.SimFirstName} will be able to perform powerful Séances with less energy decay, and gain an increased chance of successfully interacting with Specters. Sims can also create a Séance Circle anywhere in the world now!

Hone your spiritual power! Sims embarking on this journey will eventually be able to do things like summon the dead, or host their own Séance with other Sims. \n\nThe Medium Skill is increased by using interactions on the Séance Table.

Trade: Paranormal Investigator Do you have spirits in your house? Do you keep finding creepy dolls in your attic? Do you ever hear creepy voices outside your head? Know this, Specters are out there, and they're kinda jerks. If you've been certified as a Paranormal Investigator, you're welcome to join the ranks of our elite phantom patrollers. As an agent, it's up to you to make this world a little less spooky.

This Sim is a certified Paranormal Investigator, issued by the Claude René Duplantier Guidry. Sims with this license are eligible to join the Federal Bureau of Spooky Investigation as a freelance investigator.
This Sim has temporarily taken the form of a ghost!
Become a Paranormal Investigator with the help of Guidry.
Things get weird around here, especially at night... Your Sims will definitely take notice.
Occasionally strange artifacts find their way into your house. Keep your eyes peeled!
Each successful night yields Reward Store Points for all Sims.
Try keeping the entities of the house on your good side.
Floating apparitions roam the lot at night! They can range from friendly to hostile.
Meet Guidry the Ghost, he’s quite the charmer.
Specters have all sorts of strange valuables on them!
In Build Mode open the Lot Info Panel and select the Haunted House Residential under Lot Type to build a Haunted House and experience unique Lot Perks.
There is something... special about this place. While living in a Haunted House adds an extra bit of risk, it's not without its rewards! Just a fair warning, things are gonna get weird. Good luck!
